content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the role of civil society organizations in the AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries?

choices.label: Civil society organizations are mostly free of government interference.
Civil society organizations resist involvement in international issues.
Civil society organizations are focused on reducing government regulations.
Civil society organizations vary in their ability to expose government corruption.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
